clinical_study.brief_title: A POC and Dose-Ranging Study of HTD1801 in PSC Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Proof-of-Concept and Dose-Ranging Study Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of HTD1801 in Adult Subjects With Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis (PSC)

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates HTD1801 in the treatment of Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis (PSC) in adults. The subjects will be randomised to 3 treatment groups, to receive 500mg, 1000mg and placebo, bid.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A primary parallel group comparison for a 6-week treatment, followed by a 6-week dose-controlled extension, and followed by a 6-week random withdrawal.
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
